reliquary:Bias.NAME: Bias
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, lose #b
#yFocus. NL #yEvoke: No effect. NL Bias is unaffected by #yFocus.

reliquary:Data.NAME: Data
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: When #yChanneled and at the start of turn, gain #b
temporary #yFocus. NL Data is unaffected by #yFocus.
